author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r36613, fix broken memmove.
* subversion/libsvn_client/merge.c
(remove_child_with_mergeinfo): Rename this...
(remove_element_from_array): ...to this.  Fix memmove to move the array
element, *not* what those elements point to.  Ouch.
(remove_absent_children, remove_children_with_deleted_mergeinfo): Replace
call to remove_child_with_mergeinfo() with remove_element_from_array().

author: gstein
msg: Get the COPIED flag set for schedule-delete children.
Ugh.
This fixes copy_test 24.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/wc_db.h:
(svn_wc__db_scan_working): clarifications in the docstring.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/wc_db.c:
(svn_wc__db_lock_add): leave a todo about a future optimization
(svn_wc__db_scan_working): leave some todos about possible assertions
* subversion/libsvn_wc/entries.c:
(read_entries): add a PARENT_COPIED localvar to record if "this dir" is
a copy or the child of a copy. nodes that are schedule-delete also
need to set this flag, in case they are a deleted child of a copied
subtree. a lot code was added to scan up from a deleted dir to find
if any of the ancestors are part of a copy.

author: cmpilato
msg: Lower-case some stuff, and remove a redundant entry.

author: gstein
msg: Fix a bug in URL computation when harvesting committables, and rearrange
some code for a slight performance improvement.
This fixes schedule_tests 10 for wc-ng.
* subversion/libsvn_client/commit_util.c:
(harvest_committables): don't bother to look for conflicts if the entry
would not be a committable because it is in a different changelist.
tighten up the scope of a variable. when figuring out which URL to use
in the commit operation, use the child's URL... not the parent's.

author: sussman
msg: * CHANGES: make some tweaks for increased clarity.
- clarify what we mean by 'tree conflicts'
- put new switches together in a clump
- use $Header$ to remind people what a keyword is
- move features out of the bugfix section into features section
- clarify that 'pack' is an svnadmin command, and what it does
- mention new public URI syntax for (rev,path) pairs
